resources.string:
Welcome to BarQuest, a world of adventure, danger and code!

 You are a simple adventurer on a quest to become stronger, and on your journey will face perilous dangers in the form of monsters.

 To begin your journey click “SCAN”
In order to find monsters you must scan a barcode or QR Code \n\n Make sure to line up the scan line with the code you are scanning

To fight a monster click the attack button 

 To heal or boost your stats temporarily use an item 

 To run away click flee, but be warned you won’t always get away
This screen shows your character stats and your progress on your adventure
As you fight monsters and gain experience you will level up and increase your stats \n\n Every 100 experience points your level will increase

Here you can check your items and change your equipped weapon 

 Weapons have differing reaches providing a bonus damage modifier. Long > Mid > Close > Long

Friendly shopkeeps will buy your loot and sell you new items 

 Check back often as the wares change from time to time
Here you can check your progress on your quests. Completing quests will advance your character, get new and rare items and give clues on your journey
